code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import closeBtn from'../../assets/images/close.png';import{useCart}from'../../context/CartContext';import ProductCartItem from'../ProductCartItem';import{formatCurrency}from'../../utilities/formatCurrency';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ShoppingCart(_ref){let{isCartOpen,onCheckoutPress}=_ref;const{closeCart,cartItems,totalPrice,cartQuantity,openCart}=useCart();const[showCartPreview,setShowCartPreview]=useState(false);const lastItem=cartItems[cartItems.length-1];useEffect(()=>{if(cartQuantity>0)setShowCartPreview(true);},[cartQuantity]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"cart-menu",className:"cart-menu",style:{padding:isCartOpen?'10px':'0',width:isCartOpen?'70%':'0'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{opacity:isCartOpen?1:0},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"close",onClick:closeCart,children:"\xD7"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginBottom:'120px'},children:cartItems.length>0?cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCartItem,{item:item},item.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"empty-text",children:"Nothing is in your cart yet."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-bottom",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Subtotal:  ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:formatCurrency(totalPrice)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{style:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center'},onClick:onCheckoutPress,className:cartItems.length>0?'button-filled':'button-disabled',children:["Checkout",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{marginLeft:'5px'},className:"chevron-right"})]})]})]})});}export default ShoppingCart;
